title: Perfect (1985) Jamie Lee Curtis + John Travolta (Opt.SWESUBS)
description:
Optional Swedish subtitles in separate idx/sub files.
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0089798/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0089798/</a>


With Jamie Lee Curtis (then 27) and John Travolta (then 31).

A female aerobics instructor meets a male reporter doing a story on health clubs, and gives us the most energetic hipwork I have ever seen in a feature film. The critics hated it, they obviously didn't see the point.

I couldn't find a torrent for this film anywhere. It is no longer for sale in Europe, so I was lucky to find this rental DVD, which is now a collector's item.

DVDrip, XviD 2-pass Widescreen 704x288, great stereo sound AC3.

Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
